ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:30:11 [Issue ID 4000-143563] urn:comicvine:4000-143563 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 21:17:48. [Issue ID 265476]
ComicInfo.Summary: According to Ivan's nightmare vision, here's what we know: The Devil has decided to finally lay claim to the Earth, and he's doing it by sending his son to Earth in search of his old angelic flaming sword. Unfortunately for Ivan, the sword is in his hands, and he's got to get it to Satan's daughter instead. It's a race against Hell to claim the power of Heaven... and before we cross the finish line, things are going to get bad. "The Scabbard" ? Since our first issue, we've been building up to this moment, one that many readers feared might never happen... at long last, Ivan eats eggs. Oh? What else is the issue about? As if that's not enough for you? Fine. Mayor Thibodeaux embarks on a desperate plan. Dirge takes control of Satan's earthly forces. Cleo faces off with Sipher, the Devil's daughter. Oh, and that weird doll flashback from issue one happens again. Happy now?
ComicInfo.Title: The Scabbard (Part 2)
